content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=10.5, y=10.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler(position x=-6.0, y=24.5), and offshore pump(position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Iron plate mine at position(x=43.0, y=-84.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill(position x=43.0, y=-84.0) and a furnace at position(x=40.0, y=-82.0)
- Burner mining drill(position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a furnace at position(x=45.0, y=-83.0)
- Burner mining drill and other furnaces at various positions

### Copper cable factory
No copper cable factory structure found

### Lab
Consists of lab(position not specified) with lab input automation-science-pack

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into full inventory
- Ensure the target entity's inventory is not full before inserting items
### Errors when setting research
- Ensure the research technology is valid and available
### Errors when inserting items into non-existent entities
- Ensure the target entity exists and can accept the item being inserted
### Errors when inserting items with incorrect prototype
- Ensure the prototype of the item being inserted is correct and exists
### Errors when furnace result is full
- Ensure the furnace result inventory is not full before smelting items
### Errors when no ingredients to smelt
- Ensure the furnace has the required ingredients to smelt before starting the smelting process
### Errors when chest is full
- Ensure the chest is not full before dropping items into it
### Errors when trying to insert items into entities that cannot accept them
- Ensure the target entity can accept the item being inserted before attempting to insert it
